config.searchmenu.name: Search menu keybind
config.searchmenu.tooltip: Which keybind should open the search menu.
config.highlightchests.name: Highlight chests
config.highlightchests.tooltip: Whether to highlight chests containing searched items.
config.maxitemsoverchests.name: Max drawn items
config.maxitemsoverthests.tooltip:
How many items to draw at once (per chest).
If set to 0, no items will be drawn (equivalent to "Item display style: None").
If set to -1, there will be no limit to how many items can be drawn
config.drawdirection.name: Item display style
config.drawdirection.tooltip: Which style to use when displaying items over chests.
config.displayguidearrows.name: Display guide arrows
config.displayguidearrows.tooltip: Whether to display arrows pointing towards chests and/or when to display arrows.
